scene.title: Return
scene.text: The development of the battle weas far from what Li Sushang had initially imagined.

text.p: Special attacks, divine skills, strategy- not a trace of such things could be found.
All she saw was tense and monotonous attacks like a rush of surging waves and defenses that gradually formed traps.

scene.text: ...This wasn't the duel Li Sushang had envisioned.

mono.p: Her eyes were already used to 「Eagle」’s martial arts
Having looked at it with the 「Sword Heart」 till now,
She found a way to fight back.

text.p: 「Eagle」’s right fist was completely powerless, clearly a feint.[\s]
However, the diversion wasn’t meant to lure in enemies or defend against them—it was actually a half-assed move that only gave him enough time to prepare
Sushang had been waiting for that brief moment.
With a single 「Sword Transformation:Cloud Eagle」, she switched from defense to offense
In an instant, she used 「Open Sword: Instant Dust」 and stabbed it into「Eagle」's throat.

mono.p: The Void Sword extended with its physical form.[\s]
When the weilder held a sword in your hand, this technique would become a merciless move that imbues the sword with internal energy, aiming straight for the enemy’s throat.
With Li Sushang's speed, her opponent had no other option but to take the sword forcefully.
She used her fingers instead of a sword, preparing for 「Eagle」’s return move.

motion.img: 老鹰-微笑-受伤擦血-近景

text.p: However, 「Eagle」 neither defended nor evaded.[\s]
Not only that, but his upper body was left empty and full of openings.

scene.text: Sushang was shocked, not having expected this development at all...
An enemy taking the initiative to show an opening could only mean two things: they either gave up on resisting or were prepared to launch a suicide attack.

text.p: The closer one got to victory, the more dangerous it would become.
People close to death often act in unexpected ways.

scene.text: However, all Sushang's mind contained was panic and confusion.

text.p: 「「Open Sword: Instant Dust」」 was extremely fast, and it didn't give her time to think.
The sword extended with its physical form. If 「Eagle」 didn't respond, he would probably die in an instant!
Just in the nick of time, Li Sushang suddenly realized something.
To tell the truth, she hadn't been prepared.
She didn’t have the resolve to wield a sword, fight her way out or kill anyone...
She was nothing more than a fifteen-year old girl who thought she’d stepped into the martial arts world, but wasn't able to abandon her respect for people and their lives.
Facing an evildoer who was about to die at her own hands...
The bet of her head, payback for the slap— everything vanished from her mind in an instant.
Li Sushang gritted her teeth and decided to withdraw the technique—
The sword was abruptly withdrawn,
which led to a great recoil force on her body, and excruciating pain in her arm.
To disperse the power of her technique, she lightly tapped her toes
All she could do was use 「Flying Swallow Returning to the Nest」 and use the rotation to whittle down its power.
Just then, a rustling sounded at her feet.
A streak of white light glittered before her eyes, slicing through the space where she’d just been standing.
At the same time as Sushang pulled back her technique...
「Eagle」’s left hand suddenly pulled out the 「Xuanyuan Sword」 and slashed upward.
If the girl hadn’t stepped back, her body would have been cut in half with a single slash.
There was no telling if Li Sushang’s kindness had been correct or not
but she had undoubtedly saved her own life.

motion.img: 老鹰-狞笑-拔刀预备-近景

scene.text: The sword came at her,and Li Sushang saw 「Eagle」, wearing a cruel smile that could no longer be concealed.
「Eagle」 lunged at her. The 「Xuanyuan Sword」 in his hand reflected a dazzling light, and suddenly fell down like lightning.

mono.p: （Is that the light of a candle? Or is it moonlight）
Just before her death, Li Sushang suddenly thought.

scene.dialog: （Should I really be curious about that?）

text.p: The Sword Mantra she had mastered over ten years of training was very calm.[\s]
The girl , who had never faced death before felt so very empty just before it.

dialog.p: Not only did I lose, I'm going to die.）
I can't even get back at him for slapping me.
Having no experience in the martial arts world really is fatal, huh?）

scene.text: The girl's thoughts were like falling leaves, gently floating on the lake of sword heart, causing small ripples.
The next moment, Sushang thought she heard a rippling echo in the center of her Heart Lake.

text.p: It was a woman's voice.
It seemed far, far away...

scene.dialog: 「You're going to live. Sushang, you will live a proper life... Promise me!」
scene.text: The girl was still hazy, but her body moved instinctively.
Turning the rotation generated by the 「Flying Swallow Returning to the Nest」 into a thrust, Sushang took action at a speed that was unbelievable to herself.
The girl usually boasted about her speed, but the way her fingers moved was so fast that even she couldn’t even accurately catch their shape.
It was exactly like lightning... No, faster than a bolt of light!

text.p: She caught the blade of the sword less than an inch away from her body.[\s]
Then, she flicked it with her finger.

scene.text: Even when her consciousness was the clearest and her sword heart was clearest, the girl had never been able to operate Taixuan Sword Qi so skillfully!

text.p: The movements of these fingers were perfect, almost on par with her master’s.
